headline: Why Costco Stock Crushed the Market Today
summary: Although the dividend raise declared by Costco Wholesale (NASDAQ: COST) wasn't surprising, it did inject a fresh surge of bullishness into its stock.  On Thursday, the big retailer's stock price rose nearly 3% on the back of the news, easily topping the 0.1% bump of the S&P 500 (SNPINDEX: ^GSPC) that trading session.  Just after market close on Wednesday, Costco declared that its upcoming quarterly distribution would be $1.30 per share, which is a sturdy 12% higher than the $1.16 it paid out previously.

headline: Costco Wholesale (NasdaqGS:COST) Expands Non-Alcoholic Offerings and Increases Dividend to US$1.30
summary: Costco Wholesale (NasdaqGS:COST) recently announced two significant events: the launch of Edna’s Non-Alcoholic Cocktail Co. products in 30 of its locations and an increase in its quarterly dividend from $1.16 to $1.30 per share, enhancing shareholder value. Over the past month, the company's stock price rose by 6% amidst mixed market conditions, where the broader market fell by 3%. These announcements likely supported Costco's performance, countering broader market declines, as investors...

headline: Best credit card for gas rewards: How to save at the pump
summary: Credit-card issuers like American Express (AXP), Bank of America (BAC), and Wells Fargo (WFC) offer cash-back rates at gas stations for some of their most popular rewards credit cards. The Costco (COST) credit card offers cash back on gas purchased at its stores. Gas stations like Shell (SHEL) and ExxonMobil (XOM) have cards that can give you discounts on the price per gallon. Yahoo Finance Host Brad Smith breaks down the options and how to choose the best fit for you. Find out more about credit card rewards:Best credit cards for gas for 2025Best cash-back credit cards for 2025Cash-back credit cards: Finding the best one for you
